metadata.feature_description: Subscribe to posts or walls to receive notifications of new activity

steps.expected: Activity Feed page loads with posts visible
steps.actual: Activity Feed page loaded successfully showing multiple posts with Subscribe links

steps.action: Identify a post with Subscribe link and verify subscription links are present
steps.expected: Posts should have Subscribe links visible in their action bar
steps.actual: Posts displayed with Subscribe links visible (e.g., 'Emoji test' post showing Subscribe option)

steps.action: Click Subscribe link on the 'Emoji test' post
steps.expected: Subscribe link changes to Unsubscribe, indicating subscription was successful
steps.actual: Subscribe link successfully changed to Unsubscribe after clicking, confirming subscription was created

steps.action: Locate a subscribed post showing Unsubscribe link
steps.expected: Previously subscribed post should show Unsubscribe option
steps.actual: The 'Emoji test' post correctly displayed Unsubscribe link after subscription

steps.action: Click Unsubscribe link on the subscribed post
steps.expected: Unsubscribe link changes back to Subscribe, indicating unsubscription was successful
steps.actual: Unsubscribe link successfully changed back to Subscribe after clicking, confirming unsubscription was completed

steps.action: Subscribe to a post (Emoji test post)
steps.actual: Subscribed to Emoji test post, now showing Unsubscribe link

steps.expected: Subscription status should persist after page reload
steps.actual: After reloading the page, the Emoji test post still shows Unsubscribe link, confirming subscription persisted in database

observations: The subscription feature uses a toggle mechanism where clicking Subscribe changes to Unsubscribe and vice versa
Subscription data is stored via the SubscriptionController API using POST requests with anti-forgery token validation
Code supports multiple subscription types: post subscriptions, user wall subscriptions, group wall subscriptions, and activity stream subscriptions

Wall subscription features (subscribe to user's wall, unsubscribe from user's wall) require navigating to a specific user's profile page, which was not accessible in the current test context without additional users configured
Notification testing for subscribed post activity requires another user to perform actions, which is outside the scope of this single-user test session
